name: Mr Ficus
description:
It all started with the plant I got from my Mom. And after a few years, I killed it :( 

So I jumped into the details of taking care of a Ficus, and then came the Ludum dare theme, Keep it alive... The rest is history. 

Hint because of the lack of tutorial: temp could be controlled by the window, and water can be add by clicking on the pot.
